articles.title: China Supports Vaccine Patent Waiver Plan Proposed By India, South Africa - NDTV
articles.description: China, which is actively pursuing vaccine diplomacy, said on Monday that it is "supportive" of India and South Africa's proposal for a temporary waiver of Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights (TRIPS) for coronavirus vaccines.
